page.title: 08Moy Family
page.content:
My dad and my brother get up at 7.00a.m. My dad works in Inverness. My mum works in the home. My brother goes to Secondary School. He is in his first year. I also have a younger brother. The oldest brother is twelve, the youngest is five. I am ten years old. Mum goes to the Post Office on Tuesday. We have a computer, a television and a radio. There are lots of rooms in the house. We have 3 cats, 1 ferret and a dog.
FAMILY LIFE is very important in our small community. There are several interelated families _ grandparents, aunts, uncles, cousins _ living near to one another. The large old houses have considerable space both inside and out.
